NotesAndLoansReceivableNetCurrent.label: Financing Receivable, after Allowance for Credit Loss, Current
NotesAndLoansReceivableNetCurrent.description: Amount, after allowance for credit loss, of financing receivable, classified as current. Includes, but is not limited to, notes and loan receivable.

NotesPayable.label: Notes Payable
NotesPayable.description: Including the current and noncurrent portions, aggregate carrying amount of all types of notes payable, as of the balance sheet date, with initial maturities beyond one year or beyond the normal operating cycle, if longer.

NotesPayableCurrent.label: Notes Payable, Current
NotesPayableCurrent.description: Sum of the carrying values as of the balance sheet date of the portions of long-term notes payable due within one year or the operating cycle if longer.

NotesPayableRelatedPartiesClassifiedCurr.label: Notes Payable, Related Parties, Current
NotesPayableRelatedPartiesClassifiedCurr.description: The amount for notes payable (written promise to pay), due to related parties. Used to reflect the current portion of the liabilities (due within one year or within the normal operating cycle if longer).

NotesPayableRelatedPartiesCurrent.label: Notes Payable, Related Parties, Current (Deprecated 2009-01-31)
NotesPayableRelatedPartiesCurrent.description: The amount for notes payable (written promise to pay), due to related parties. For classified balance sheets, used to reflect the current portion of the liabilities (due within one year or within the normal operating cycle if longer); for unclassified balance sheets, used to reflect the total liabilities (regardless of due date).

NotesPayableRelatedPartiesNoncurrent.label: Notes Payable, Related Parties, Noncurrent
NotesPayableRelatedPartiesNoncurrent.description: The amount for notes payable (written promise to pay), payable to related parties, which are due after one year (or one business cycle).

OperatingExpenses.label: Operating Expenses
OperatingExpenses.description: Generally recurring costs associated with normal operations except for the portion of these expenses which can be clearly related to production and included in cost of sales or services. Includes selling, general and administrative expense.

OperatingIncomeLoss.label: Operating Income (Loss)
OperatingIncomeLoss.description: The net result for the period of deducting operating expenses from operating revenues.

OperatingLeaseLiabilityCurrent.label: Operating Lease, Liability, Current
OperatingLeaseLiabilityCurrent.description: Present value of lessee's discounted obligation for lease payments from operating lease, classified as current.

OperatingLeaseLiabilityNoncurrent.label: Operating Lease, Liability, Noncurrent
OperatingLeaseLiabilityNoncurrent.description: Present value of lessee's discounted obligation for lease payments from operating lease, classified as noncurrent.

OperatingLeaseRightOfUseAsset.label: Operating Lease, Right-of-Use Asset
OperatingLeaseRightOfUseAsset.description: Amount of lessee's right to use underlying asset under operating lease.

OperatingLossCarryforwards.label: Operating Loss Carryforwards
OperatingLossCarryforwards.description: Amount of operating loss carryforward, before tax effects, available to reduce future taxable income under enacted tax laws.

OperatingLossCarryforwardsValuationAllow.label: Operating Loss Carryforwards, Valuation Allowance
OperatingLossCarryforwardsValuationAllow.description: The portion of the valuation allowance pertaining to the deferred tax asset representing potential future taxable deductions from net operating loss carryforwards for which it is more likely than not that a tax benefit will not be realized.

OriginationOfNotesReceivableFromRelatedP.label: Origination of Notes Receivable from Related Parties
OriginationOfNotesReceivableFromRelatedP.description: The cash outflow for a loan, supported by a promissory note, granted to related parties where one party can exercise control or significant influence over another party; including affiliates, owners or officers and their immediate families, pension trusts, and so forth.

OtherAccruedLiabilitiesCurrent.label: Other Accrued Liabilities, Current
OtherAccruedLiabilitiesCurrent.description: Amount of expenses incurred but not yet paid classified as other, due within one year or the normal operating cycle, if longer.

OtherAssetImpairmentCharges.label: Other Asset Impairment Charges
OtherAssetImpairmentCharges.description: The charge against earnings resulting from the write down of long lived assets other than goodwill due to the difference between the carrying value and lower fair value.

OtherComprehensiveIncomeDefinedBenefitPl.label: Other Comprehensive Income (Loss), Defined Benefit Plan, Gain (Loss) Arising During Period, after Tax
OtherComprehensiveIncomeDefinedBenefitPl.description: Amount, after tax, of gain (loss) for (increase) decrease in value of benefit obligation for change in actuarial assumptions and increase (decrease) in value of plan assets from experience different from that assumed of defined benefit plan, that has not been recognized in net periodic benefit (cost) credit.

OtherComprehensiveIncomeForeignCurrencyT.label: Other Comprehensive Income (Loss), Foreign Currency Transaction and Translation Adjustment, before Tax, Portion Attributable to Parent
OtherComprehensiveIncomeForeignCurrencyT.description: Amount before tax, after reclassification adjustments of gain (loss) on foreign currency translation adjustments, on foreign currency transactions designated and effective as economic hedges of a net investment in a foreign entity and intra-entity foreign currency transactions that are of a long-term-investment nature, attributable to parent entity.

OtherComprehensiveIncomeForeignCurrencyT.label: Other Comprehensive Income (Loss), Foreign Currency Translation Adjustment, Tax, Portion Attributable to Parent
OtherComprehensiveIncomeForeignCurrencyT.description: Amount of tax expense (benefit), after reclassification adjustments of gain (loss) on foreign currency translation adjustments, foreign currency transactions designated and effective as economic hedges of a net investment in a foreign entity and intra-entity foreign currency transactions that are of a long-term-investment nature, attributable to parent entity.

OtherComprehensiveIncomeLossNetOfTax.label: Other Comprehensive Income (Loss), Net of Tax
OtherComprehensiveIncomeLossNetOfTax.description: Amount after tax and reclassification adjustments of other comprehensive income (loss).

OtherCostAndExpenseOperating.label: Other Cost and Expense, Operating
OtherCostAndExpenseOperating.description: The total amount of other operating cost and expense items that are associated with the entity's normal revenue producing operation.

OtherDepreciationAndAmortization.label: Other Depreciation and Amortization
OtherDepreciationAndAmortization.description: Amount of expense charged against earnings to allocate the cost of tangible and intangible assets over their remaining economic lives, classified as other.

OtherExpenses.label: Other Expenses
OtherExpenses.description: Amount of expense classified as other.

OtherGeneralAndAdministrativeExpense.label: Other General and Administrative Expense
OtherGeneralAndAdministrativeExpense.description: Amount of general and administrative expense classified as other.

OtherGeneralExpense.label: Other General Expense
OtherGeneralExpense.description: Amount of general expenses not normally included in Other Operating Costs and Expenses.

OtherIncome.label: Other Income
OtherIncome.description: Amount of revenue and income classified as other.

OtherLoansPayableCurrent.label: Other Loans Payable, Current
OtherLoansPayableCurrent.description: Amount of long-term loans classified as other, payable within one year or the operating cycle, if longer.

OtherNoncashIncomeExpense.label: Other Noncash Income (Expense)
OtherNoncashIncomeExpense.description: Amount of income (expense) included in net income that results in no cash inflow (outflow), classified as other.

OtherNonoperatingExpense.label: Other Nonoperating Expense
OtherNonoperatingExpense.description: Amount of expense related to nonoperating activities, classified as other.

OtherNonoperatingIncomeExpense.label: Other Nonoperating Income (Expense)
OtherNonoperatingIncomeExpense.description: Amount of income (expense) related to nonoperating activities, classified as other.

OtherNotesPayable.label: Other Notes Payable
OtherNotesPayable.description: Amount of long-term notes payable classified as other.

OtherNotesPayableCurrent.label: Other Notes Payable, Current
OtherNotesPayableCurrent.description: Amount of long-term notes classified as other, payable within one year or the normal operating cycle, if longer.

OtherSellingGeneralAndAdministrativeExpe.label: Other Selling, General and Administrative Expense
OtherSellingGeneralAndAdministrativeExpe.description: Amount of selling, general and administrative expense classified as other.

OtherTaxExpenseBenefit.label: Other Tax Expense (Benefit)
OtherTaxExpenseBenefit.description: Amount of other income tax expense (benefit).

PaymentsForLoans.label: Payments for Loans
PaymentsForLoans.description: Cash payments for and related to principal collection on loans related to operating activities.

PaymentsOfLoanCosts.label: Payments of Loan Costs
PaymentsOfLoanCosts.description: The cash outflow for loan origination associated cost which is usually collected through escrow.

PaymentsToAcquireIntangibleAssets.label: Payments to Acquire Intangible Assets
PaymentsToAcquireIntangibleAssets.description: The cash outflow to acquire asset without physical form usually arising from contractual or other legal rights, excluding goodwill.

PaymentsToAcquireMachineryAndEquipment.label: Payments to Acquire Machinery and Equipment
PaymentsToAcquireMachineryAndEquipment.description: The cash outflow for acquisition of machinery and equipment.

PaymentsToAcquireMineralRights.label: Payments to Acquire Mineral Rights
PaymentsToAcquireMineralRights.description: The cash outflow from the acquisition of a mineral right which is the right to extract a mineral from the earth or to receive payment, in the form of royalty, for the extraction of minerals.

PaymentsToAcquireOilAndGasProperty.label: Payments to Acquire Oil and Gas Property
PaymentsToAcquireOilAndGasProperty.description: The cash outflow to purchase of mineral interests in oil and gas properties for use in the normal oil and gas operations and not intended for resale.

PaymentsToAcquireOtherPropertyPlantAndEq.label: Payments to Acquire Other Property, Plant, and Equipment
PaymentsToAcquireOtherPropertyPlantAndEq.description: Amount of cash outflow from the acquisition of or improvements to long-lived, physical assets used to produce goods and services and not intended for resale, classified as other.

PaymentsToAcquirePropertyPlantAndEquipme.label: Payments to Acquire Property, Plant, and Equipment
PaymentsToAcquirePropertyPlantAndEquipme.description: The cash outflow associated with the acquisition of long-lived, physical assets that are used in the normal conduct of business to produce goods and services and not intended for resale; includes cash outflows to pay for construction of self-constructed assets.

PreferredStockParOrStatedValuePerShare.label: Preferred Stock, Par or Stated Value Per Share
PreferredStockParOrStatedValuePerShare.description: Face amount or stated value per share of preferred stock nonredeemable or redeemable solely at the option of the issuer.

PreferredStockSharesAuthorized.label: Preferred Stock, Shares Authorized
PreferredStockSharesAuthorized.description: The maximum number of nonredeemable preferred shares (or preferred stock redeemable solely at the option of the issuer) permitted to be issued by an entity's charter and bylaws.

PreferredStockSharesIssued.label: Preferred Stock, Shares Issued
PreferredStockSharesIssued.description: Total number of nonredeemable preferred shares (or preferred stock redeemable solely at the option of the issuer) issued to shareholders (includes related preferred shares that were issued, repurchased, and remain in the treasury). May be all or portion of the number of preferred shares authorized. Excludes preferred shares that are classified as debt.

PreferredStockSharesOutstanding.label: Preferred Stock, Shares Outstanding
PreferredStockSharesOutstanding.description: Aggregate share number for all nonredeemable preferred stock (or preferred stock redeemable solely at the option of the issuer) held by stockholders. Does not include preferred shares that have been repurchased.

PreferredStockSharesSubscribedButUnissue.label: Preferred Stock, Value, Subscriptions
PreferredStockSharesSubscribedButUnissue.description: Amount of subscription received from investors who have been allocated nonredeemable preferred stock or preferred stock redeemable solely at the option of the issuer.

PreferredStockValue.label: Preferred Stock, Value, Issued
PreferredStockValue.description: Aggregate par or stated value of issued nonredeemable preferred stock (or preferred stock redeemable solely at the option of the issuer). This item includes treasury stock repurchased by the entity. Note: elements for number of nonredeemable preferred shares, par value and other disclosure concepts are in another section within stockholders' equity.

PrepaidExpenseAndOtherAssets.label: Prepaid Expense and Other Assets
PrepaidExpenseAndOtherAssets.description: Amount of asset related to consideration paid in advance for costs that provide economic benefits in future periods, and amount of other assets.

PrepaidExpenseCurrent.label: Prepaid Expense, Current
PrepaidExpenseCurrent.description: Amount of asset related to consideration paid in advance for costs that provide economic benefits within a future period of one year or the normal operating cycle, if longer.

ProceedsFromConstructionLoansPayable.label: Proceeds from Construction Loans Payable
ProceedsFromConstructionLoansPayable.description: The cash inflow from borrowings to finance the cost of construction.

ProceedsFromContributedCapital.label: Proceeds from Contributed Capital
ProceedsFromContributedCapital.description: The cash inflow associated with the amount received by a corporation from a shareholder during the period.

ProceedsFromContributionsFromAffiliates.label: Proceeds from Contributions from Affiliates
ProceedsFromContributionsFromAffiliates.description: The cash inflow from an entity that is affiliated with the entity by means of direct or indirect ownership.

ProceedsFromIssuanceOfCommonStock.label: Proceeds from Issuance of Common Stock
ProceedsFromIssuanceOfCommonStock.description: The cash inflow from the additional capital contribution to the entity.

ProceedsFromIssuanceOfPrivatePlacement.label: Proceeds from Issuance of Private Placement
ProceedsFromIssuanceOfPrivatePlacement.description: The cash inflow associated with the amount received from entity's raising of capital via private rather than public placement.

ProceedsFromIssuanceOrSaleOfEquity.label: Proceeds from Issuance or Sale of Equity
ProceedsFromIssuanceOrSaleOfEquity.description: The cash inflow from the issuance of common stock, preferred stock, treasury stock, stock options, and other types of equity.

ProceedsFromLinesOfCredit.label: Proceeds from Lines of Credit
ProceedsFromLinesOfCredit.description: Amount of cash inflow from contractual arrangement with the lender, including but not limited to, letter of credit, standby letter of credit and revolving credit arrangements.

ProceedsFromLoans.label: Proceeds from Loans
ProceedsFromLoans.description: Cash received from principal payments made on loans related to operating activities.

ProceedsFromLongTermLinesOfCredit.label: Proceeds from Long-term Lines of Credit
ProceedsFromLongTermLinesOfCredit.description: The cash inflow from a contractual arrangement with the lender, including letter of credit, standby letter of credit and revolving credit arrangements, under which borrowings can be made up to a specific amount at any point in time with maturities due beyond one year or the operating cycle, if longer.

ProceedsFromNotesPayable.label: Proceeds from Notes Payable
ProceedsFromNotesPayable.description: The cash inflow from a borrowing supported by a written promise to pay an obligation.

ProceedsFromOtherDebt.label: Proceeds from Other Debt
ProceedsFromOtherDebt.description: Amount of cash inflow from debt classified as other.

ProceedsFromRelatedPartyDebt.label: Proceeds from Related Party Debt
ProceedsFromRelatedPartyDebt.description: The cash inflow from a long-term borrowing made from related parties where one party can exercise control or significant influence over another party; including affiliates, owners or officers and their immediate families, pension trusts, and so forth. Alternate caption: Proceeds from Advances from Affiliates.

ProceedsFromRepaymentsOfBankOverdrafts.label: Proceeds from (Repayments of) Bank Overdrafts
ProceedsFromRepaymentsOfBankOverdrafts.description: The net cash inflow or outflow from the excess drawing from an existing cash balance, which will be honored by the bank but reflected as a loan to the drawer.

ProceedsFromRepaymentsOfLinesOfCredit.label: Proceeds from (Repayments of) Lines of Credit
ProceedsFromRepaymentsOfLinesOfCredit.description: The net cash inflow or cash outflow from a contractual arrangement with the lender, including letter of credit, standby letter of credit and revolving credit arrangements, under which borrowings can be made up to a specific amount at any point in time with either short term or long term maturity that is collateralized (backed by pledge, mortgage or other lien in the entity's assets).

ProceedsFromRepaymentsOfNotesPayable.label: Proceeds from (Repayments of) Notes Payable
ProceedsFromRepaymentsOfNotesPayable.description: Amount of cash inflow (outflow) from long-term debt supported by a written promise to pay an obligation.

ProceedsFromRepaymentsOfRelatedPartyDebt.label: Proceeds from (Repayments of) Related Party Debt
ProceedsFromRepaymentsOfRelatedPartyDebt.description: Amount of cash inflow (outflow) from long-term debt by a related party. Related parties, include, but are not limited to, affiliates, owners or officers and their immediate families, and pension trusts.

ProceedsFromSecuredNotesPayable.label: Proceeds from Secured Notes Payable
ProceedsFromSecuredNotesPayable.description: The cash inflow from borrowings supported by a written promise to pay an obligation that is collateralized (backed by pledge, mortgage or other lien in the entity's assets).

ProceedsFromStockOptionsExercised.label: Proceeds from Stock Options Exercised
ProceedsFromStockOptionsExercised.description: Amount of cash inflow from exercise of option under share-based payment arrangement.

ProceedsFromWarrantExercises.label: Proceeds from Warrant Exercises
ProceedsFromWarrantExercises.description: The cash inflow associated with the amount received from holders exercising their stock warrants.

ProfessionalAndContractServicesExpense.label: Professional and Contract Services Expense
ProfessionalAndContractServicesExpense.description: Professional and contract service expense includes cost reimbursements for support services related to contracted projects, outsourced management, technical and staff support.

ProfessionalFees.label: Professional Fees
ProfessionalFees.description: A fee charged for services from professionals such as doctors, lawyers and accountants. The term is often expanded to include other professions, for example, pharmacists charging to maintain a medicinal profile of a client or customer.

ProfitLoss.label: Net Income (Loss), Including Portion Attributable to Noncontrolling Interest
ProfitLoss.description: The consolidated profit or loss for the period, net of income taxes, including the portion attributable to the noncontrolling interest.

PropertyPlantAndEquipmentGross.label: Property, Plant and Equipment, Gross
PropertyPlantAndEquipmentGross.description: Amount before accumulated depreciation, depletion and amortization of physical assets used in the normal conduct of business and not intended for resale. Examples include, but are not limited to, land, buildings, machinery and equipment, office equipment, and furniture and fixtures.

PropertyPlantAndEquipmentGrossExcludingC.label: Property, Plant and Equipment, Gross, Excluding Capital Leased Assets
PropertyPlantAndEquipmentGrossExcludingC.description: Gross amount of long-lived physical assets excluding assets held under lease agreements used in the normal conduct of business and not intended for resale. Examples include, but are not limited to, land, buildings, machinery and equipment, office equipment, furniture and fixtures, and computer equipment.

PropertyPlantAndEquipmentNet.label: Property, Plant and Equipment, Net
PropertyPlantAndEquipmentNet.description: Amount after accumulated depreciation, depletion and amortization of physical assets used in the normal conduct of business to produce goods and services and not intended for resale. Examples include, but are not limited to, land, buildings, machinery and equipment, office equipment, and furniture and fixtures.

PropertyPlantAndEquipmentOther.label: Property, Plant and Equipment, Other, Gross
PropertyPlantAndEquipmentOther.description: Amount before accumulated depreciation, depletion and amortization of other physical assets used in the normal conduct of business to produce goods and services and not intended for resale.

PropertyPlantAndEquipmentOtherAccumulate.label: Property, Plant and Equipment, Other, Accumulated Depreciation
PropertyPlantAndEquipmentOtherAccumulate.description: Amount of accumulated depreciation of long-lived, physical assets used to produce goods and services and not intended for resale, classified as other.

ProvisionForDoubtfulAccounts.label: Accounts Receivable, Credit Loss Expense (Reversal)
ProvisionForDoubtfulAccounts.description: Amount of expense (reversal of expense) for expected credit loss on accounts receivable.

RepaymentsOfCommercialPaper.label: Repayments of Commercial Paper
RepaymentsOfCommercialPaper.description: The cash outflow due to repaying amounts borrowed by issuing commercial paper.

RepaymentsOfConvertibleDebt.label: Repayments of Convertible Debt
RepaymentsOfConvertibleDebt.description: The cash outflow from the repayment of a long-term debt instrument which can be exchanged for a specified amount of another security, typically the entity's common stock, at the option of the issuer or the holder.

RepaymentsOfNotesPayable.label: Repayments of Notes Payable
RepaymentsOfNotesPayable.description: The cash outflow for a borrowing supported by a written promise to pay an obligation.

RepaymentsOfOtherDebt.label: Repayments of Other Debt
RepaymentsOfOtherDebt.description: Amount of cash outflow for the payment of debt classified as other.

RepaymentsOfRelatedPartyDebt.label: Repayments of Related Party Debt
RepaymentsOfRelatedPartyDebt.description: The cash outflow for the payment of a long-term borrowing made from a related party where one party can exercise control or significant influence over another party; including affiliates, owners or officers and their immediate families, pension trusts, and so forth. Alternate caption: Payments for Advances from Affiliates.

RepaymentsOfShortTermDebt.label: Repayments of Short-term Debt
RepaymentsOfShortTermDebt.description: The cash outflow for a borrowing having initial term of repayment within one year or the normal operating cycle, if longer.

RepaymentsOfUnsecuredDebt.label: Repayments of Unsecured Debt
RepaymentsOfUnsecuredDebt.description: The cash outflow to repay long-term debt that is not secured by collateral. Excludes repayments of tax exempt unsecured debt.

ResearchAndDevelopmentExpense.label: Research and Development Expense
ResearchAndDevelopmentExpense.description: The aggregate costs incurred (1) in a planned search or critical investigation aimed at discovery of new knowledge with the hope that such knowledge will be useful in developing a new product or service, a new process or technique, or in bringing about a significant improvement to an existing product or process; or (2) to translate research findings or other knowledge into a plan or design for a new product or process or for a significant improvement to an existing product or process whether intended for sale or the entity's use, during the reporting period charged to research and development projects, including the costs of developing computer software up to the point in time of achieving technological feasibility, and costs allocated in accounting for a business combination to in-process projects deemed to have no alternative future use.

RetainedEarningsAccumulatedDeficit.label: Retained Earnings (Accumulated Deficit)
RetainedEarningsAccumulatedDeficit.description: The cumulative amount of the reporting entity's undistributed earnings or deficit.

RevenueFromRelatedParties.label: Revenue from Related Parties
RevenueFromRelatedParties.description: Amount of revenue, fees and commissions earned from transactions between (a) a parent company and its subsidiaries; (b) subsidiaries of a common parent; (c) an entity and trusts for the benefit of employees, for example, but not limited to, pension and profit-sharing trusts that are managed by or under the trusteeship of the entity's management; (d) an entity and its principal, owners, management, or members of their immediate families; and (e) affiliates.

Revenues.label: Revenues
Revenues.description: Amount of revenue recognized from goods sold, services rendered, insurance premiums, or other activities that constitute an earning process. Includes, but is not limited to, investment and interest income before deduction of interest expense when recognized as a component of revenue, and sales and trading gain (loss).

SaleOfStockNumberOfSharesIssuedInTransac.label: Sale of Stock, Number of Shares Issued in Transaction
SaleOfStockNumberOfSharesIssuedInTransac.description: The number of shares issued or sold by the subsidiary or equity method investee per stock transaction.

SalesCommissionsAndFees.label: Sales Commissions and Fees
SalesCommissionsAndFees.description: Primarily represents commissions incurred in the period based upon the sale by commissioned employees or third parties of the entity's goods or services, and fees for sales assistance or product enhancements performed by third parties (such as a distributor or value added reseller).

SalesRevenueNet.label: Revenue, Net (Deprecated 2018-01-31)
SalesRevenueNet.description: Total revenue from sale of goods and services rendered during the reporting period, in the normal course of business, reduced by sales returns and allowances, and sales discounts.

SellingGeneralAndAdministrativeExpense.label: Selling, General and Administrative Expense
SellingGeneralAndAdministrativeExpense.description: The aggregate total costs related to selling a firm's product and services, as well as all other general and administrative expenses. Direct selling expenses (for example, credit, warranty, and advertising) are expenses that can be directly linked to the sale of specific products. Indirect selling expenses are expenses that cannot be directly linked to the sale of specific products, for example telephone expenses, Internet, and postal charges. General and administrative expenses include salaries of non-sales personnel, rent, utilities, communication, etc.

SettlementLiabilitiesCurrent.label: Settlement Liabilities, Current
SettlementLiabilitiesCurrent.description: Amounts payable for money transfers, money orders, and consumer payment service arrangements. Settlement liabilities include amounts payable to intermediaries for global payment transfers.

ShareBasedCompensation.label: Share-based Payment Arrangement, Noncash Expense
ShareBasedCompensation.description: Amount of noncash expense for share-based payment arrangement.

ShareBasedCompensationArrangementByShare.label: Share-based Compensation Arrangement by Share-based Payment Award, Options, Grants in Period, Net of Forfeitures
ShareBasedCompensationArrangementByShare.description: Net number of share options (or share units) granted during the period.

SharesOutstanding.label: Shares, Outstanding
SharesOutstanding.description: Number of shares issued which are neither cancelled nor held in the treasury.

SignificantCostsIncurredToAcquireMineral.label: Significant Costs Incurred to Acquire Mineral Interest of Proved Reserves
SignificantCostsIncurredToAcquireMineral.description: Significant costs that have been incurred, including capitalized costs and costs charged to expense, to acquire mineral interests that have proved reserves.

StockholdersEquity.label: Stockholders' Equity Attributable to Parent
StockholdersEquity.description: Total of all stockholders' equity (deficit) items, net of receivables from officers, directors, owners, and affiliates of the entity which are attributable to the parent. The amount of the economic entity's stockholders' equity attributable to the parent excludes the amount of stockholders' equity which is allocable to that ownership interest in subsidiary equity which is not attributable to the parent (noncontrolling interest, minority interest). This excludes temporary equity and is sometimes called permanent equity.

StockholdersEquityIncludingPortionAttrib.label: Stockholders' Equity, Including Portion Attributable to Noncontrolling Interest
StockholdersEquityIncludingPortionAttrib.description: Amount of stockholders' equity (deficit), net of receivables from officers, directors, owners, and affiliates of the entity, attributable to both the parent and noncontrolling interests. Amount excludes temporary equity. Alternate caption for the concept is permanent equity.

StockholdersEquityOther.label: Stockholders' Equity, Other
StockholdersEquityOther.description: This element represents movements included in the statement of changes in stockholders' equity which are not separately disclosed or provided for elsewhere in the taxonomy.

StockIssued.label: Stock Issued (Deprecated 2011-01-31)
StockIssued.description: The fair value of stock issued in noncash financing activities.

StockIssued1.label: Stock Issued
StockIssued1.description: The fair value of stock issued in noncash financing activities.

StockIssuedDuringPeriodSharesAcquisition.label: Stock Issued During Period, Shares, Acquisitions
StockIssuedDuringPeriodSharesAcquisition.description: Number of shares of stock issued during the period pursuant to acquisitions.

StockIssuedDuringPeriodSharesConversionO.label: Stock Issued During Period, Shares, Conversion of Convertible Securities
StockIssuedDuringPeriodSharesConversionO.description: Number of shares issued during the period as a result of the conversion of convertible securities.

StockIssuedDuringPeriodSharesNewIssues.label: Stock Issued During Period, Shares, New Issues
StockIssuedDuringPeriodSharesNewIssues.description: Number of new stock issued during the period.

StockIssuedDuringPeriodSharesOther.label: Stock Issued During Period, Shares, Other
StockIssuedDuringPeriodSharesOther.description: Number of shares of stock issued attributable to transactions classified as other.

StockIssuedDuringPeriodSharesPeriodIncre.label: Stock Issued During Period, Shares, Period Increase (Decrease)
StockIssuedDuringPeriodSharesPeriodIncre.description: The increase (decrease) during the period in the number of shares issued.

StockIssuedDuringPeriodSharesPurchaseOfA.label: Stock Issued During Period, Shares, Purchase of Assets
StockIssuedDuringPeriodSharesPurchaseOfA.description: Number of shares of stock issued during the period as part of a transaction to acquire assets that do not qualify as a business combination.

StockIssuedDuringPeriodSharesRestrictedS.label: Stock Issued During Period, Shares, Restricted Stock Award, Net of Forfeitures
StockIssuedDuringPeriodSharesRestrictedS.description: Number of shares issued during the period related to Restricted Stock Awards, net of any shares forfeited.

StockIssuedDuringPeriodSharesStockOption.label: Share-based Compensation Arrangement by Share-based Payment Award, Options, Exercises in Period
StockIssuedDuringPeriodSharesStockOption.description: Number of share options (or share units) exercised during the current period.

StockIssuedDuringPeriodValueAcquisitions.label: Stock Issued During Period, Value, Acquisitions
StockIssuedDuringPeriodValueAcquisitions.description: Value of stock issued pursuant to acquisitions during the period.

StockIssuedDuringPeriodValueConversionOf.label: Stock Issued During Period, Value, Conversion of Convertible Securities
StockIssuedDuringPeriodValueConversionOf.description: The gross value of stock issued during the period upon the conversion of convertible securities.

StockIssuedDuringPeriodValueIssuedForSer.label: Stock Issued During Period, Value, Issued for Services
StockIssuedDuringPeriodValueIssuedForSer.description: Value of stock issued in lieu of cash for services contributed to the entity. Value of the stock issued includes, but is not limited to, services contributed by vendors and founders.

StockIssuedDuringPeriodValueNewIssues.label: Stock Issued During Period, Value, New Issues
StockIssuedDuringPeriodValueNewIssues.description: Equity impact of the value of new stock issued during the period. Includes shares issued in an initial public offering or a secondary public offering.

StockIssuedDuringPeriodValueOther.label: Stock Issued During Period, Value, Other
StockIssuedDuringPeriodValueOther.description: Value of shares of stock issued attributable to transactions classified as other.

StockIssuedDuringPeriodValuePurchaseOfAs.label: Stock Issued During Period, Value, Purchase of Assets
StockIssuedDuringPeriodValuePurchaseOfAs.description: Value of shares of stock issued during the period as part of a transaction to acquire assets that do not qualify as a business combination.

StockIssuedDuringPeriodValueShareBasedCo.label: Shares Issued, Value, Share-based Payment Arrangement, after Forfeiture
StockIssuedDuringPeriodValueShareBasedCo.description: Value, after forfeiture, of shares issued under share-based payment arrangement. Excludes employee stock ownership plan (ESOP).

StockIssuedDuringPeriodValueStockOptions.label: Stock Issued During Period, Value, Stock Options Exercised
StockIssuedDuringPeriodValueStockOptions.description: Value of stock issued as a result of the exercise of stock options.

StockOptionPlanExpense.label: Stock or Unit Option Plan Expense
StockOptionPlanExpense.description: Amount of noncash expense for option under share-based payment arrangement.

StockRepurchasedAndRetiredDuringPeriodVa.label: Stock Repurchased and Retired During Period, Value
StockRepurchasedAndRetiredDuringPeriodVa.description: Equity impact of the value of stock that has been repurchased and retired during the period. The excess of the purchase price over par value can be charged against retained earnings (once the excess is fully allocated to additional paid in capital).

TaxesPayableCurrentAndNoncurrent.label: Taxes Payable
TaxesPayableCurrentAndNoncurrent.description: Carrying value as of the balance sheet date of obligations incurred and payable for statutory income, sales, use, payroll, excise, real, property and other taxes.

TemporaryEquityForeignCurrencyTranslatio.label: Temporary Equity, Foreign Currency Translation Adjustments
TemporaryEquityForeignCurrencyTranslatio.description: Adjustments to temporary equity resulting from foreign currency translation adjustments.

UnrealizedGainLossOnDerivatives.label: Unrealized Gain (Loss) on Derivatives
UnrealizedGainLossOnDerivatives.description: The net change in the difference between the fair value and the carrying value, or in the comparative fair values, of derivative instruments, including options, swaps, futures, and forward contracts, held at each balance sheet date, that was included in earnings for the period.

UnrecognizedTaxBenefitsInterestOnIncomeT.label: Unrecognized Tax Benefits, Interest on Income Taxes Expense
UnrecognizedTaxBenefitsInterestOnIncomeT.description: Amount of interest expense for an underpayment of income taxes.

UnrecognizedTaxBenefitsPeriodIncreaseDec.label: Unrecognized Tax Benefits, Period Increase (Decrease)
UnrecognizedTaxBenefitsPeriodIncreaseDec.description: Amount of increase (decrease) in unrecognized tax benefits attributable to uncertain tax positions taken in tax returns.

UnsecuredDebtCurrent.label: Unsecured Debt, Current
UnsecuredDebtCurrent.description: Carrying value as of the balance sheet date of the portion of long-term, uncollateralized debt obligations due within one year or the normal operating cycle, if longer.

WeightedAverageLimitedPartnershipUnitsOu.label: Weighted Average Limited Partnership Units Outstanding, Diluted
WeightedAverageLimitedPartnershipUnitsOu.description: Weighted average number of limited partnership units outstanding determined by relating the portion of time within a reporting period that limited partnership units have been outstanding to the total time in that period. Used in the calculation of diluted net income or loss per limited partnership unit.

WeightedAverageNumberDilutedSharesOutsta.label: Weighted Average Number Diluted Shares Outstanding Adjustment
WeightedAverageNumberDilutedSharesOutsta.description: The sum of dilutive potential common shares or units used in the calculation of the diluted per-share or per-unit computation.

WeightedAverageNumberOfDilutedSharesOuts.label: Weighted Average Number of Shares Outstanding, Diluted
WeightedAverageNumberOfDilutedSharesOuts.description: The average number of shares or units issued and outstanding that are used in calculating diluted EPS or earnings per unit (EPU), determined based on the timing of issuance of shares or units in the period.

WeightedAverageNumberOfShareOutstandingB.label: Weighted Average Number of Shares Outstanding, Basic and Diluted
WeightedAverageNumberOfShareOutstandingB.description: Average number of shares or units issued and outstanding that are used in calculating basic and diluted earnings per share (EPS).

WeightedAverageNumberOfSharesIssuedBasic.label: Weighted Average Number of Shares Issued, Basic
WeightedAverageNumberOfSharesIssuedBasic.description: This element represents the weighted average total number of shares issued throughout the period including the first (beginning balance outstanding) and last (ending balance outstanding) day of the period before considering any reductions (for instance, shares held in treasury) to arrive at the weighted average number of shares outstanding. Weighted average relates to the portion of time within a reporting period that common shares have been issued and outstanding to the total time in that period. Such concept is used in determining the weighted average number of shares outstanding for purposes of calculating earnings per share (basic).

WeightedAverageNumberOfSharesOutstanding.label: Weighted Average Number of Shares Outstanding, Basic
WeightedAverageNumberOfSharesOutstanding.description: Number of [basic] shares or units, after adjustment for contingently issuable shares or units and other shares or units not deemed outstanding, determined by relating the portion of time within a reporting period that common shares or units have been outstanding to the total time in that period.

AccountsReceivableGross.label: Accounts Receivable, before Allowance for Credit Loss
AccountsReceivableGross.description: Amount, before allowance for credit loss, of right to consideration from customer for product sold and service rendered in normal course of business.

FinancingReceivableAllowanceForCreditLos.label: Financing Receivable, Allowance for Credit Loss
FinancingReceivableAllowanceForCreditLos.description: Amount of allowance for credit loss on financing receivable. Excludes allowance for financing receivable covered under loss sharing agreement.

LeaseAndRentalExpense.label: Operating Leases, Rent Expense
LeaseAndRentalExpense.description: Amount of rent expense incurred for leased assets, including but not limited to, furniture and equipment, that is not directly or indirectly associated with the manufacture, sale or creation of a product or product line.

NotesReceivableRelatedPartiesCurrent.label: Notes Receivable, Related Parties, Current
NotesReceivableRelatedPartiesCurrent.description: Amounts due from parties associated with the reporting entity as evidenced by a written promise to pay, due within 1 year (or 1 business cycle).

OtherAssets.label: Other Assets
OtherAssets.description: Amount of assets classified as other.

PaymentsForAdvanceToAffiliate.label: Payments for Advance to Affiliate
PaymentsForAdvanceToAffiliate.description: The cash outflow from advancing money to an affiliate (an entity that is related but not strictly controlled by the entity).

SaleOfStockConsiderationReceivedOnTransa.label: Sale of Stock, Consideration Received on Transaction
SaleOfStockConsiderationReceivedOnTransa.description: Cash received on stock transaction after deduction of issuance costs.

AccruedIncomeTaxesCurrent.label: Accrued Income Taxes, Current
AccruedIncomeTaxesCurrent.description: Carrying amount as of the balance sheet date of the unpaid sum of the known and estimated amounts payable to satisfy all currently due domestic and foreign income tax obligations.

AllowanceForDoubtfulAccountsReceivableRe.label: Accounts Receivable, Allowance for Credit Loss, Recovery
AllowanceForDoubtfulAccountsReceivableRe.description: Amount of increase in allowance for credit loss on accounts receivable, from recovery.

AmortizationOfIntangibleAssets.label: Amortization of Intangible Assets
AmortizationOfIntangibleAssets.description: The aggregate expense charged against earnings to allocate the cost of intangible assets (nonphysical assets not used in production) in a systematic and rational manner to the periods expected to benefit from such assets. As a noncash expense, this element is added back to net income when calculating cash provided by or used in operations using the indirect method.

AmortizationOfLeaseIncentives.label: Amortization of Lease Incentives
AmortizationOfLeaseIncentives.description: Amount of amortization of lease incentive costs incurred by the lessor for the benefit of the lessee.

CashCashEquivalentsRestrictedCashAndRest.label: Cash, Cash Equivalents, Restricted Cash and Restricted Cash Equivalents, Period Increase (Decrease), Including Exchange Rate Effect
CashCashEquivalentsRestrictedCashAndRest.description: Amount of increase (decrease) in cash, cash equivalents, and cash and cash equivalents restricted to withdrawal or usage; including effect from exchange rate change. Cash includes, but is not limited to, currency on hand, demand deposits with banks or financial institutions, and other accounts with general characteristics of demand deposits. Cash equivalents include, but are not limited to, short-term, highly liquid investments that are both readily convertible to known amounts of cash and so near their maturity that they present insignificant risk of changes in value because of changes in interest rates.

CommonUnitOutstanding.label: Common Unit, Outstanding
CommonUnitOutstanding.description: Number of common units of ownership outstanding of a limited liability company (LLC).

ContractWithCustomerLiabilityCurrent.label: Contract with Customer, Liability, Current
ContractWithCustomerLiabilityCurrent.description: Amount of obligation to transfer good or service to customer for which consideration has been received or is receivable, classified as current.

DebtInstrumentRedemptionPricePercentage.label: Debt Instrument, Redemption Price, Percentage
DebtInstrumentRedemptionPricePercentage.description: Percentage price of original principal amount of debt at which debt can be redeemed by the issuer.

DeferredRevenue.label: Deferred Revenue
DeferredRevenue.description: Amount of deferred income and obligation to transfer product and service to customer for which consideration has been received or is receivable.

DeferredRevenuePeriodIncreaseDecrease.label: Deferred Revenue, Period Increase (Decrease)
DeferredRevenuePeriodIncreaseDecrease.description: Amount of increase (decrease) in deferred revenue.

DeferredTaxAssetsLiabilitiesNet.label: Deferred Tax Assets, Net
DeferredTaxAssetsLiabilitiesNet.description: Amount, after allocation of valuation allowances and deferred tax liability, of deferred tax asset attributable to deductible differences and carryforwards, without jurisdictional netting.

DeferredTaxLiabilities.label: Deferred Tax Liabilities, Net
DeferredTaxLiabilities.description: Amount, after deferred tax asset, of deferred tax liability attributable to taxable differences without jurisdictional netting.

DevelopmentCosts.label: Development Costs, Period Cost
DevelopmentCosts.description: The capitalized costs incurred during the period (excluded from amortization) to obtain access to proved reserves and to provide facilities for extracting, treating, gathering and storing the oil and gas.

Goodwill.label: Goodwill
Goodwill.description: Amount after accumulated impairment loss of an asset representing future economic benefits arising from other assets acquired in a business combination that are not individually identified and separately recognized.

IncomeLossAttributableToNoncontrollingIn.label: Income (Loss) Attributable to Noncontrolling Interest, before Tax
IncomeLossAttributableToNoncontrollingIn.description: Amount, before tax, of income (loss) attributable to noncontrolling interest. Includes, but is not limited to, income (loss) from continuing operations, discontinued operations and equity method investments.

IncreaseDecreaseInAccruedTaxesPayable.label: Increase (Decrease) in Accrued Taxes Payable
IncreaseDecreaseInAccruedTaxesPayable.description: The increase (decrease) during the reporting period of all taxes owed but not paid, including income, property and other taxes.

IncreaseDecreaseInInventories.label: Increase (Decrease) in Inventories
IncreaseDecreaseInInventories.description: The increase (decrease) during the reporting period in the aggregate value of all inventory held by the reporting entity, associated with underlying transactions that are classified as operating activities.

InventoryNet.label: Inventory, Net
InventoryNet.description: Amount after valuation and LIFO reserves of inventory expected to be sold, or consumed within one year or operating cycle, if longer.

MinorityInterest.label: Stockholders' Equity Attributable to Noncontrolling Interest
MinorityInterest.description: Total of all stockholders' equity (deficit) items, net of receivables from officers, directors, owners, and affiliates of the entity which is directly or indirectly attributable to that ownership interest in subsidiary equity which is not attributable to the parent (that is, noncontrolling interest, previously referred to as minority interest).

NoncashOrPartNoncashAcquisitionInterestA.label: Noncash or Part Noncash Acquisition, Interest Acquired
NoncashOrPartNoncashAcquisitionInterestA.description: "The level of ownership or equity interest acquired in a noncash (or part noncash) transaction. ""Part noncash"" refers to that portion of the transaction not resulting in cash receipts or cash payments in the period."

NoncurrentAssets.label: Long-Lived Assets
NoncurrentAssets.description: Long-lived assets other than financial instruments, long-term customer relationships of a financial institution, mortgage and other servicing rights, deferred policy acquisition costs, and deferred tax assets.

NumberOfOperatingSegments.label: Number of Operating Segments
NumberOfOperatingSegments.description: Number of operating segments. An operating segment is a component of an enterprise: (a) that engages in business activities from which it may earn revenues and incur expenses (including revenues and expenses relating to transactions with other components of the same enterprise), (b) whose operating results are regularly reviewed by the enterprise's chief operating decision maker to make decisions about resources to be allocated to the segment and assess its performance, and (c) for which discrete financial information is available. An operating segment may engage in business activities for which it has yet to earn revenues, for example, start-up operations may be operating segments before earning revenues.

RevenueFromContractWithCustomerIncluding.label: Revenue from Contract with Customer, Including Assessed Tax
RevenueFromContractWithCustomerIncluding.description: Amount, including tax collected from customer, of revenue from satisfaction of performance obligation by transferring promised good or service to customer. Tax collected from customer is tax assessed by governmental authority that is both imposed on and concurrent with specific revenue-producing transaction, including, but not limited to, sales, use, value-added and excise.

ShareBasedCompensationArrangementByShare.label: Share-based Compensation Arrangement by Share-based Payment Award, Options, Vested and Expected to Vest, Outstanding, Number
ShareBasedCompensationArrangementByShare.description: Number of fully vested and expected to vest options outstanding that can be converted into shares under option plan. Includes, but is not limited to, unvested options for which requisite service period has not been rendered but that are expected to vest based on achievement of performance condition, if forfeitures are recognized when they occur.

SharePrice.label: Share Price
SharePrice.description: Price of a single share of a number of saleable stocks of a company.

StockIssuedDuringPeriodValueShareBasedCo.label: Shares Issued, Value, Share-based Payment Arrangement, Forfeited
StockIssuedDuringPeriodValueShareBasedCo.description: Value of forfeited shares issued under share-based payment arrangement. Excludes employee stock ownership plan (ESOP).

TreasuryStockShares.label: Treasury Stock, Shares
TreasuryStockShares.description: Number of common and preferred shares that were previously issued and that were repurchased by the issuing entity and held in treasury on the financial statement date. This stock has no voting rights and receives no dividends.

AmountOfDilutiveSecuritiesESOPConvertibl.label: Dilutive Securities, Effect on Basic Earnings Per Share, ESOP Convertible Preferred Stock
AmountOfDilutiveSecuritiesESOPConvertibl.description: Amount of increase (decrease) to net income used for calculating diluted earnings per share (EPS), resulting from the assumed exercise of convertible preferred stock of an employee stock ownership plan (ESOP).

DueFromBanks.label: Due from Banks
DueFromBanks.description: A bank's noninterest bearing demand deposits in other banks (such as correspondents).

FiniteLivedIntangibleAssetsNet.label: Finite-Lived Intangible Assets, Net
FiniteLivedIntangibleAssetsNet.description: Amount after amortization of assets, excluding financial assets and goodwill, lacking physical substance with a finite life.

GainLossOnInvestments.label: Gain (Loss) on Investments
GainLossOnInvestments.description: Amount of realized and unrealized gain (loss) on investment.

IncreaseDecreaseInTradingLiabilities.label: Increase (Decrease) in Trading Liabilities
IncreaseDecreaseInTradingLiabilities.description: The increase (decrease) during the reporting period in the aggregate amount of trading liabilities from the reporting entity's trading activities. This include liabilities resulting from sales of assets that the reporting entity does not own and revaluation losses.

OtherInventorySupplies.label: Other Inventory, Supplies, Gross
OtherInventorySupplies.description: Amount before valuation and LIFO reserves of other supplies used within the manufacturing or production process expected to be consumed within one year or operating cycle, if longer.

SupplementaryInsuranceInformationOtherPo.label: SEC Schedule, 12-16, Insurance Companies, Supplementary Insurance Information, Other Policy Claim and Benefit Payable
SupplementaryInsuranceInformationOtherPo.description: Amount of claim and benefit payable classified as other, disclosed in supplementary insurance information.

TaxesPayableCurrent.label: Taxes Payable, Current
TaxesPayableCurrent.description: Carrying value as of the balance sheet date of obligations incurred and payable for statutory income, sales, use, payroll, excise, real, property and other taxes. Used to reflect the current portion of the liabilities (due within one year or within the normal operating cycle if longer).

AccountsAndNotesReceivableNet.label: Accounts and Financing Receivable, after Allowance for Credit Loss
AccountsAndNotesReceivableNet.description: Amount, after allowance for credit loss, of accounts and financing receivable. Includes, but is not limited to, notes and loan receivable.

AccountsPayableAndOtherAccruedLiabilitie.label: Accounts Payable and Other Accrued Liabilities
AccountsPayableAndOtherAccruedLiabilitie.description: Amount of liabilities incurred and payable to vendors for goods and services received, and accrued liabilities classified as other.

AccruedIncomeTaxes.label: Accrued Income Taxes
AccruedIncomeTaxes.description: Carrying amount as of the balance sheet date of the unpaid sum of the known and estimated amounts payable to satisfy all domestic and foreign income tax obligations due. This amount is the total of current and noncurrent accrued income taxes.

CashCashEquivalentsRestrictedCashAndRest.label: Cash, Cash Equivalents, Restricted Cash and Restricted Cash Equivalents
CashCashEquivalentsRestrictedCashAndRest.description: Amount of cash and cash equivalents, and cash and cash equivalents restricted to withdrawal or usage. Excludes amount for disposal group and discontinued operations. Cash includes, but is not limited to, currency on hand, demand deposits with banks or financial institutions, and other accounts with general characteristics of demand deposits. Cash equivalents include, but are not limited to, short-term, highly liquid investments that are both readily convertible to known amounts of cash and so near their maturity that they present insignificant risk of changes in value because of changes in interest rates.

CommonStockDividendsPerShareCashPaid.label: Common Stock, Dividends, Per Share, Cash Paid
CommonStockDividendsPerShareCashPaid.description: Aggregate dividends paid during the period for each share of common stock outstanding.

ComprehensiveIncomeNetOfTaxIncludingPort.label: Comprehensive Income (Loss), Net of Tax, Including Portion Attributable to Noncontrolling Interest
ComprehensiveIncomeNetOfTaxIncludingPort.description: Amount after tax of increase (decrease) in equity from transactions and other events and circumstances from net income and other comprehensive income. Excludes changes in equity resulting from investments by owners and distributions to owners.

DeferredIncomeTaxLiabilities.label: Deferred Tax Liabilities, Gross
DeferredIncomeTaxLiabilities.description: Amount of deferred tax liability attributable to taxable temporary differences.

IncomeTaxesPaid.label: Income Taxes Paid
IncomeTaxesPaid.description: The amount of cash paid during the current period to foreign, federal, state, and local authorities as taxes on income.

IncreaseDecreaseInCustomerDeposits.label: Increase (Decrease) in Customer Deposits
IncreaseDecreaseInCustomerDeposits.description: The increase (decrease) during the period in the amount of customer money held in customer accounts, including security deposits, collateral for a current or future transactions, initial payment of the cost of acquisition or for the right to enter into a contract or agreement.

IntangibleAssetsNetExcludingGoodwill.label: Intangible Assets, Net (Excluding Goodwill)
IntangibleAssetsNetExcludingGoodwill.description: Sum of the carrying amounts of all intangible assets, excluding goodwill, as of the balance sheet date, net of accumulated amortization and impairment charges.

NetIncomeLossAttributableToNoncontrollin.label: Net Income (Loss) Attributable to Noncontrolling Interest
NetIncomeLossAttributableToNoncontrollin.description: Amount of Net Income (Loss) attributable to noncontrolling interest.

OtherComprehensiveIncomeLossForeignCurre.label: Other Comprehensive Income (Loss), Foreign Currency Transaction and Translation Adjustment, Net of Tax
OtherComprehensiveIncomeLossForeignCurre.description: Amount after tax and reclassification adjustments of gain (loss) on foreign currency translation adjustments, foreign currency transactions designated and effective as economic hedges of a net investment in a foreign entity and intra-entity foreign currency transactions that are of a long-term-investment nature.

PaymentsToAcquireLeasesHeldForInvestment.label: Payments to Acquire Leases Held-for-investment
PaymentsToAcquireLeasesHeldForInvestment.description: The cash outflow associated with purchasing leases held for investment purposes during an accounting period.

SecurityDeposit.label: Security Deposit
SecurityDeposit.description: The amount of an asset, typically cash, provided to a counterparty to provide certain assurance of performance by the entity pursuant to the terms of a written or oral agreement, such as a lease.

ShareBasedCompensationArrangementByShare.label: Share-based Compensation Arrangement by Share-based Payment Award, Options, Exercisable, Number
ShareBasedCompensationArrangementByShare.description: The number of shares into which fully or partially vested stock options outstanding as of the balance sheet date can be currently converted under the option plan.

ShareBasedCompensationArrangementByShare.label: Share-based Compensation Arrangement by Share-based Payment Award, Options, Exercisable, Weighted Average Exercise Price
ShareBasedCompensationArrangementByShare.description: The weighted-average price as of the balance sheet date at which grantees can acquire the shares reserved for issuance on vested portions of options outstanding and currently exercisable under the stock option plan.

ShareBasedCompensationArrangementByShare.label: Share-based Compensation Arrangement by Share-based Payment Award, Options, Expirations in Period
ShareBasedCompensationArrangementByShare.description: Number of options or other stock instruments for which the right to exercise has lapsed under the terms of the plan agreements.

ShareBasedCompensationArrangementByShare.label: Share-based Compensation Arrangement by Share-based Payment Award, Options, Grants in Period, Gross
ShareBasedCompensationArrangementByShare.description: Gross number of share options (or share units) granted during the period.

ShareBasedCompensationArrangementByShare.label: Share-based Compensation Arrangement by Share-based Payment Award, Options, Outstanding, Number
ShareBasedCompensationArrangementByShare.description: Number of options outstanding, including both vested and non-vested options.

ShareBasedCompensationArrangementByShare.label: Share-based Compensation Arrangement by Share-based Payment Award, Options, Outstanding, Weighted Average Exercise Price
ShareBasedCompensationArrangementByShare.description: Weighted average price at which grantees can acquire the shares reserved for issuance under the stock option plan.

ShareBasedCompensationArrangementsByShar.label: Share-based Compensation Arrangements by Share-based Payment Award, Options, Exercises in Period, Weighted Average Exercise Price
ShareBasedCompensationArrangementsByShar.description: Weighted average price at which option holders acquired shares when converting their stock options into shares.

ShareBasedCompensationArrangementsByShar.label: Share-based Compensation Arrangements by Share-based Payment Award, Options, Expirations in Period, Weighted Average Exercise Price
ShareBasedCompensationArrangementsByShar.description: Weighted average price at which grantees could have acquired the underlying shares with respect to stock options of the plan that expired.

ShareBasedCompensationArrangementsByShar.label: Share-based Compensation Arrangements by Share-based Payment Award, Options, Forfeitures in Period, Weighted Average Exercise Price
ShareBasedCompensationArrangementsByShar.description: Weighted average price at which grantees could have acquired the underlying shares with respect to stock options that were terminated.

ShareBasedCompensationArrangementsByShar.label: Share-based Compensation Arrangements by Share-based Payment Award, Options, Grants in Period, Weighted Average Exercise Price
ShareBasedCompensationArrangementsByShar.description: Weighted average per share amount at which grantees can acquire shares of common stock by exercise of options.

StockGrantedDuringPeriodValueSharebasedC.label: Shares Granted, Value, Share-based Payment Arrangement, before Forfeiture
StockGrantedDuringPeriodValueSharebasedC.description: Value, before forfeiture, of shares granted under share-based payment arrangement. Excludes employee stock ownership plan (ESOP).

DepositAssets.label: Deposit Assets
DepositAssets.description: The carrying amount of the asset transferred to a third party to serve as a deposit, which typically serves as security against failure by the transferor to perform under terms of an agreement.

IncomeTaxCreditsAndAdjustments.label: Income Tax Credits and Adjustments
IncomeTaxCreditsAndAdjustments.description: A credit or adjustment for government or taxing authority authorized decrease in taxes owed as a result of meeting certain tax policy conditions.

IncomeTaxReconciliationTaxCredits.label: Effective Income Tax Rate Reconciliation, Tax Credit, Amount
IncomeTaxReconciliationTaxCredits.description: Amount of the difference between reported income tax expense (benefit) and expected income tax expense (benefit) computed by applying the domestic federal statutory income tax rates to pretax income (loss) from continuing operations attributable to tax credits. Including, but not limited to, research credit, foreign tax credit, investment tax credit, and other tax credits.

IncreaseDecreaseInDeferredRevenue.label: Increase (Decrease) in Deferred Revenue
IncreaseDecreaseInDeferredRevenue.description: Amount of increase (decrease) in deferred income and obligation to transfer product and service to customer for which consideration has been received or is receivable.

LitigationSettlementInterest.label: Litigation Settlement Interest
LitigationSettlementInterest.description: Interest expense (income) directly attributable to an award in settlement of litigation.

PaymentsForRepurchaseOfEquity.label: Payments for Repurchase of Equity
PaymentsForRepurchaseOfEquity.description: The cash outflow to reacquire common and preferred stock.

SaleOfStockPercentageOfOwnershipAfterTra.label: Sale of Stock, Percentage of Ownership after Transaction
SaleOfStockPercentageOfOwnershipAfterTra.description: Percentage of subsidiary's or equity investee's stock owned by parent company after stock transaction.

StockIssuedDuringPeriodSharesIssuedForSe.label: Stock Issued During Period, Shares, Issued for Services
StockIssuedDuringPeriodSharesIssuedForSe.description: Number of shares issued in lieu of cash for services contributed to the entity. Number of shares includes, but is not limited to, shares issued for services contributed by vendors and founders.

WeightedAverageNumberOfSharesRestrictedS.label: Weighted Average Number of Shares, Restricted Stock
WeightedAverageNumberOfSharesRestrictedS.description: Number of shares of restricted stock determined by relating the portion of time within a reporting period that restricted shares have been outstanding to the total time in that period. Restricted shares are subject to sales, contractual, regulatory or other restrictions that prevent or inhibit the holder from freely disposing of them before the restriction ends.

ProFormaWeightedAverageSharesOutstanding.label: Pro Forma Weighted Average Shares Outstanding, Diluted
ProFormaWeightedAverageSharesOutstanding.description: The weighted average number of shares or units and dilutive common stock or unit equivalents outstanding in the calculation of proforma diluted earnings per share (earnings per unit), which is commonly presented in initial public offerings based on the terms of the offering.
